h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T4.0363^ea^ ^a^M3.0163^ea^ ^a^V3.0171^ea^ ^a^P4.0351^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `sambodhipakkhikaana.m {sambodhapakkhikaana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, aavuso, dhammaana.m kaa upanisaa bhaavanaayaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m ^a^V3.0172^ea^ paribbaajakaana.m kinti byaakareyyaathaa''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.
[03] ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `sambodhipakkhikaana.m, aavuso, dhammaana.m kaa upanisaa bhaavanaayaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa ^a^M3.0164^ea^ tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha ^a^T4.0364^ea^ --
[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto hoti kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ^a^P4.0352^ea^. sambodhipakkhikaana.m, aavuso, dhammaana.m aya.m pa.thamaa upanisaa bhaavanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. sambodhipakkhikaana.m, aavuso, dhammaana.m aya.m dutiyaa upanisaa bhaavanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu yaaya.m kathaa abhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa siilakathaa samaadhikathaa pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupiyaa kathaaya nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. sambodhipakkhikaana.m, aavuso, dhammaana.m aya.m tatiyaa upanisaa bhaavanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. sambodhipakkhikaana.m, aavuso, dhammaana.m aya.m catutthii upanisaa bhaavanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya ^a^V3.0173^ea^ nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. sambodhipakkhikaana.m, aavuso, dhammaana.m aya.m pa~ncamii upanisaa bhaavanaaya''.

[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m ^a^T4.0365^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- siilavaa bhavissati, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharissati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhissati sikkhaapadesu.

[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- yaaya.m kathaa abhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa ^a^M3.0165^ea^ asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa siilakathaa samaadhikathaa pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupiyaa kathaaya nikaamalaabhii bhavissati akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.

[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- aaraddhaviiriyo viharissati ^a^P4.0353^ea^ akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- pa~n~navaa bhavissati udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa.

[03] ``tena ca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa imesu pa~ncasu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya cattaaro dhammaa uttari {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhaavetabbaa -- asubhaa bhaavetabbaa raagassa pahaanaaya, mettaa bhaavetabbaa byaapaadassa pahaanaaya, aanaapaanassati {aanaapaanasati (sii0 pii0)} bhaavetabbaa vitakkupacchedaaya, aniccasa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa asmimaanasamugghaataaya. aniccasa~n~nino, bhikkhave, anattasa~n~naa sa.n.thaati. anattasa~n~nii asmimaanasamugghaata.m paapu.naati di.t.theva dhamme nibbaana''nti ^a^T4.0366^ea^. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V3.0174^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```nissayasampanno nissayasampanno'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hotii''ti? ``saddha.m ce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissaaya akusala.m pajahati kusala.m bhaaveti, pahiinamevassa ta.m akusala.m hoti. hiri.m ce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissaaya...pe0... ottappa.m ce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissaaya...pe0... viiriya.m ce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissaaya...pe0... pa~n~na.m ce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissaaya akusala.m pajahati kusala.m bhaaveti, pahiinamevassa ta.m akusala.m hoti ^a^P4.0354^ea^. ta.m hissa bhikkhuno akusala.m pahiina.m hoti suppahiina.m, ya.msa ariyaaya pa~n~naaya disvaa pahiina.m''.

[03] ``tena ^a^M3.0166^ea^ ca pana, bhikkhu, bhikkhunaa imesu pa~ncasu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya cattaaro upanissaaya vihaatabbaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu sa"nkhaayeka.m pa.tisevati, sa"nkhaayeka.m adhivaaseti, sa"nkhaayeka.m parivajjeti, sa"nkhaayeka.m vinodeti. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa caalikaaya.m viharati caalikaapabbate. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa meghiyo bhagavato upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho aayasmaa meghiyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho aayasmaa meghiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, jantugaama.m {jatugaama.m (sii0 a.t.tha0, syaa0 a.t.tha0), jattugaama.m (ka0 a.t.thakathaayampi paa.thantara.m)} pi.n.daaya ^a^T4.0367^ea^ pavisitu''nti. ``yassa daani tva.m, meghiya, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa meghiyo pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya jantugaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. jantugaame pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena kimikaa.laaya nadiyaa tiira.m tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho aayasmaa meghiyo kimikaa.laaya nadiyaa ^a^V3.0175^ea^ tiire ja"nghaavihaara.m {ja"nghavihaara.m (syaa0 ka0)} anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano ambavana.m ^a^P4.0355^ea^ paasaadika.m rama.niiya.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``paasaadika.m vatida.m ambavana.m rama.niiya.m, ala.m vatida.m kulaputtassa padhaanatthikassa padhaanaaya. sace ma.m bhagavaa anujaaneyya, aagaccheyyaaha.m ima.m ambavana.m padhaanaayaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa meghiyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa meghiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya jantugaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. jantugaame pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena kimikaa.laaya nadiyaa tiira.m tenupasa"nkami.m. addasa.m kho aha.m, bhante, kimikaa.laaya nadiyaa tiire ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano ambavana.m paasaadika.m rama.niiya.m. disvaana me etadahosi -- `paasaadika.m vatida.m ambavana.m rama.niiya.m. ala.m vatida.m kulaputtassa padhaanatthikassa padhaanaaya. sace ^a^M3.0167^ea^ ma.m bhagavaa anujaaneyya, aagaccheyyaaha.m ima.m ambavana.m padhaanaayaa'ti. sace ma.m bhagavaa anujaaneyya, gaccheyyaaha.m ta.m ambavana.m padhaanaayaa''ti. ``aagamehi taava, meghiya ^a^T4.0368^ea^! ekakamhi {ekakamhaa (sii0 pii0)} taava {vata (ka0)} yaava a~n~nopi koci bhikkhu aagacchatii''ti {dissatuuti (sabbattha, .tiikaayampi paa.thantara.m), aagacchatuuti, dissatiiti (.tiikaaya.m paa.thantaraani)}.

[03] dutiyampi kho aayasmaa meghiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhagavato, bhante, natthi ki~nci uttari kara.niiya.m, natthi katassa pa.ticayo. mayha.m kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari kara.niiya.m, atthi katassa pa.ticayo. sace ma.m bhagavaa anujaaneyya, gaccheyyaaha.m ta.m ambavana.m padhaanaayaa''ti. ``aagamehi taava, meghiya, ekakamhi taava yaava a~n~nopi koci bhikkhu aagacchatii''ti.

[03] tatiyampi ^a^P4.0356^ea^ kho aayasmaa meghiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhagavato, bhante, natthi ki~nci uttari kara.niiya.m, natthi katassa pa.ticayo. mayha.m kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari kara.niiya.m, atthi katassa pa.ticayo. sace ma.m bhagavaa anujaaneyya, gaccheyyaaha.m ta.m ambavana.m padhaanaayaa''ti. ``padhaananti kho, meghiya, vadamaana.m kinti vadeyyaama! yassa daani tva.m, meghiya, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0176^ea^ kho aayasmaa meghiyo u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena ta.m ambavana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m ambavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho aayasmato meghiyassa tasmi.m ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa samudaacaranti, seyyathida.m -- kaamavitakko, byaapaadavitakko, vihi.msaavitakko. atha kho aayasmato meghiyassa etadahosi -- ``acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! saddhaaya ca vatamhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa; atha ca panimehi tiihi paapakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvaasattaa -- kaamavitakkena, byaapaadavitakkena, vihi.msaavitakkenaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^T4.0369^ea^ kho aayasmaa meghiyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa meghiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idha ^a^M3.0168^ea^ mayha.m, bhante, tasmi.m ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa samudaacaranti, seyyathida.m -- kaamavitakko, byaapaadavitakko, vihi.msaavitakko. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! saddhaaya ca vatamhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa; atha ca panimehi ^a^P4.0357^ea^ tiihi paapakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvaasattaa -- kaamavitakkena, byaapaadavitakkena, vihi.msaavitakkenaati'''.

[03] ``aparipakkaaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyaa pa~nca dhammaa paripakkaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto hoti kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko. aparipakkaaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyaa aya.m pa.thamo dhammo paripakkaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, meghiya, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. aparipakkaaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyaa aya.m dutiyo dhammo paripakkaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, meghiya, yaaya.m kathaa abhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa ^a^V3.0177^ea^ santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa ^a^T4.0370^ea^ viiriyaarambhakathaa siilakathaa samaadhikathaa pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupiyaa kathaaya nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. aparipakkaaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyaa aya.m tatiyo dhammo paripakkaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, meghiya, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. aparipakkaaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyaa aya.m catuttho dhammo paripakkaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, meghiya, bhikkhu pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. aparipakkaaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyaa aya.m pa~ncamo dhammo paripakkaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m ^a^M3.0169^ea^, meghiya, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- `siilavaa bhavissati...pe0 ^a^P4.0358^ea^... samaadaaya sikkhissati sikkhaapadesu'''.

[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m, meghiya, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- `yaaya.m kathaa abhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupiyaa kathaaya nikaamalaabhii bhavissati akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii'''.
[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m, meghiya, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- `aaraddhaviiriyo viharissati...pe0... anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu'''.
[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m ^a^T4.0371^ea^, meghiya, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- `pa~n~navaa bhavissati...pe0... sammaadukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa'''.

[03] ``tena ^a^V3.0178^ea^ ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhunaa imesu pa~ncasu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya cattaaro dhammaa uttari bhaavetabbaa -- asubhaa bhaavetabbaa raagassa pahaanaaya, mettaa bhaavetabbaa byaapaadassa pahaanaaya, aanaapaanassati bhaavetabbaa vitakkupacchedaaya, aniccasa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa asmimaanasamugghaataaya. aniccasa~n~nino, meghiya, anattasa~n~naa sa.n.thaati. anattasa~n~nii asmimaanasamugghaata.m paapu.naati di.t.theva dhamme nibbaana''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa nandako upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bahidvaarako.t.thake a.t.thaasi kathaapariyosaana.m aagamayamaano. atha kho bhagavaa kathaapariyosaana.m viditvaa ukkaasetvaa agga.la.m ^a^P4.0359^ea^ aako.tesi. vivari.msu kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato dvaara.m.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0170^ea^ kho bhagavaa upa.t.thaanasaala.m pavisitvaa pa~n~nattaasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m nandaka.m etadavoca -- ``diigho kho tyaaya.m, nandaka, dhammapariyaayo bhikkhuuna.m pa.tibhaasi. api me pi.t.thi aagilaayati bahidvaarako.t.thake ^a^T4.0372^ea^ .thitassa kathaapariyosaana.m aagamayamaanassaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa nandako saarajjamaanaruupo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``na kho pana maya.m, bhante, jaanaama `bhagavaa bahidvaarako.t.thake .thito'ti. sace hi maya.m, bhante, jaaneyyaama `bhagavaa bahidvaarako.t.thake .thito'ti, ettakampi ( ) {(dhamma.m) katthaci} no nappa.tibhaaseyyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m nandaka.m saarajjamaanaruupa.m viditvaa aayasmanta.m nandaka.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, saadhu, nandaka! eta.m kho, nandaka, tumhaaka.m patiruupa.m kulaputtaana.m saddhaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaana.m, ya.m tumhe dhammiyaa kathaaya sannisiideyyaatha. sannipatitaana.m vo, nandaka, dvaya.m kara.niiya.m -- dhammii vaa kathaa ariyo vaa tu.nhiibhaavo. {a0 ni0 8.71; 9.1} saddho ca, nandaka, bhikkhu ^a^V3.0179^ea^ hoti, no ca siilavaa. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m ^a^P4.0360^ea^ siilavaa caa'ti. yato ca kho, nandaka, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca, eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti.

[03] ``saddho ca, nandaka, bhikkhu hoti siilavaa ca, no ca laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m siilavaa ca laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissaa'ti. yato ca kho, nandaka, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa, eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti.

[03] ``saddho ca, nandaka, bhikkhu hoti siilavaa ca laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. eva.m so tena"ngena ^a^T4.0373^ea^ aparipuuro hoti. seyyathaapi, nandaka, paa.nako catuppaadako assa. tassa eko paado omako laamako. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro assa. evameva.m kho, nandaka, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. eva.m ^a^M3.0171^ea^ so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m siilavaa ca laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``yato ca kho, nandaka, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hotii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa nandako acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idaani, aavuso, bhagavaa catuuhi padehi kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetvaa ^a^P4.0361^ea^ u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `saddho ca, nandaka, bhikkhu hoti, no ca siilavaa. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m siilavaa caa'ti. yato ca kho nandaka bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca, eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. saddho ca nandaka bhikkhu hoti siilavaa ca, no ca laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa...pe0... laabhii ^a^V3.0180^ea^ ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro ^a^T4.0374^ea^ hoti. seyyathaapi nandaka paa.nako catuppaadako assa, tassa eko paado omako laamako, eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro assa. evameva.m kho, nandaka, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca, laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti, tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m siilavaa ca, laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa, laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaayaa'ti. yato ca kho, nandaka, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamaadhissa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hotii''ti.

[03] ``pa~ncime, aavuso, aanisa.msaa kaalena dhammassavane kaalena dhammasaakacchaaya. katame pa~nca? idhaavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. yathaa yathaa, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti ^a^M3.0172^ea^, tathaa tathaa so satthu piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. aya.m, aavuso, pa.thamo aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane kaalena dhammasaakacchaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m ^a^T4.0375^ea^ brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. yathaa yathaa, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m...pe0... brahmacariya.m ^a^P4.0362^ea^ pakaaseti, tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammappa.tisa.mvedii ca. aya.m, aavuso, dutiyo aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane kaalena dhammasaakacchaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. yathaa yathaa, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m...pe0... brahmacariya.m pakaaseti, tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme gambhiira.m atthapada.m pa~n~naaya ativijjha passati. aya.m, aavuso, tatiyo aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane kaalena dhammasaakacchaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0181^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m...pe0... brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. yathaa yathaa, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m...pe0... brahmacariya.m pakaaseti, tathaa tathaa na.m sabrahmacaarii uttari sambhaaventi -- `addhaa ayamaayasmaa patto vaa pajjati vaa'. aya.m, aavuso, catuttho aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane kaalena dhammasaakacchaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. yathaa yathaa, aavuso, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m ^a^T4.0376^ea^, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti, tattha ye kho bhikkhuu sekhaa appattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti, te ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa viiriya.m aarabhanti appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa ^a^M3.0173^ea^ adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. ye pana tattha bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naavimuttaa, te ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.myeva ^a^P4.0363^ea^ anuyuttaa viharanti. aya.m, aavuso, pa~ncamo aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane kaalena dhammasaakacchaaya. ime kho, aavuso, pa~nca aanisa.msaa kaalena dhammassavane kaalena dhammasaakacchaayaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani cattaari? pa~n~naabala.m, viiriyabala.m, anavajjabala.m, sa"ngaahabala.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m? ye dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa saavajjaa saavajjasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa anavajjaa anavajjasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa ka.nhaa ka.nhasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa sukkaa sukkasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa sevitabbaa sevitabbasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa asevitabbaa asevitabbasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa naalamariyaa naalamariyasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa alamariyaa alamariyasa"nkhaataa, tyaassa dhammaa pa~n~naaya vodi.t.thaa honti vocaritaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^T4.0377^ea^ ^a^V3.0182^ea^, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m? ye dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa saavajjaa saavajjasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa ka.nhaa ka.nhasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa asevitabbaa asevitabbasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa naalamariyaa naalamariyasa"nkhaataa, tesa.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ye dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa anavajjaa anavajjasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa sukkaa sukkasa"nkhaataa ye dhammaa sevitabbaa sevitabbasa"nkhaataa ^a^P4.0364^ea^ ye dhammaa alamariyaa alamariyasa"nkhaataa, tesa.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, anavajjabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako anavajjena kaayakammena samannaagato hoti, anavajjena vaciikammena samannaagato hoti, anavajjena manokammena samannaagato hoti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, anavajjabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^M3.0174^ea^, bhikkhave, sa"ngaahabala.m? cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, sa"ngahavatthuuni -- daana.m, peyyavajja.m, atthacariyaa, samaanattataa. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, daanaana.m yadida.m dhammadaana.m. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, peyyavajjaana.m yadida.m atthikassa ohitasotassa punappuna.m dhamma.m deseti. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, atthacariyaana.m yadida.m assaddha.m saddhaasampadaaya samaadapeti niveseti pati.t.thaapeti, dussiila.m siilasampadaaya... pe0... macchari.m caagasampadaaya...pe0... duppa~n~na.m pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti niveseti pati.t.thaapeti. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, samaanattataana.m yadida.m ^a^T4.0378^ea^ sotaapanno sotaapannassa samaanatto, sakadaagaamii sakadaagaamissa samaanatto, anaagaamii anaagaamissa samaanatto, arahaa arahato samaanatto. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sa"ngaahabala.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari balaani.

[03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi balehi samannaagato ariyasaavako pa~nca bhayaani samatikkanto hoti. katamaani pa~nca? aajiivikabhaya.m, asilokabhaya.m, parisasaarajjabhaya.m, mara.nabhaya.m ^a^P4.0365^ea^, duggatibhaya.m. sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `naaha.m aajiivikabhayassa bhaayaami. kissaaha.m aajiivikabhayassa bhaayissaami? atthi me cattaari balaani -- pa~n~naabala.m, viiriyabala.m, anavajjabala.m, sa"ngaahabala.m. duppa~n~no kho aajiivikabhayassa ^a^V3.0183^ea^ bhaayeyya. kusiito aajiivikabhayassa bhaayeyya. saavajjakaayakammantavaciikammantamanokammanto aajiivikabhayassa bhaayeyya. asa"ngaahako aajiivikabhayassa bhaayeyya. naaha.m asilokabhayassa bhaayaami...pe0... naaha.m parisasaarajjabhayassa bhaayaami...pe0... naaha.m mara.nabhayassa bhaayaami...pe0... naaha.m duggatibhayassa bhaayaami. kissaaha.m duggatibhayassa bhaayissaami? atthi me cattaari balaani -- pa~n~naabala.m, viiriyabala.m, anavajjabala.m, sa"ngaahabala.m. duppa~n~no kho duggatibhayassa bhaayeyya. kusiito duggatibhayassa bhaayeyya. saavajjakaayakammantavaciikammantamanokammanto duggatibhayassa bhaayeyya. asa"ngaahako duggatibhayassa bhaayeyya. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi balehi samannaagato ariyasaavako imaani pa~nca bhayaani samatikkanto hotii''ti. pa~ncama.m.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ tatra ^a^T4.0379^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi...pe0... aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``puggalopi ^a^M3.0175^ea^, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopi. ciivarampi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabba.m -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampi. pi.n.dapaatopi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopi. senaasanampi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabba.m -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampi. gaamanigamopi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi ^a^P4.0366^ea^ asevitabbopi. janapadapadesopi aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopi.

[03] ```puggalopi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa puggala.m -- `ima.m kho me puggala.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti; ye ca kho me pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa te ca kasirena samudaagacchanti; yassa camhi atthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito so ca me saama~n~nattho ^a^V3.0184^ea^ na bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchatii'ti, tenaavuso, puggalena so puggalo rattibhaaga.m vaa divasabhaaga.m vaa sa"nkhaapi anaapucchaa pakkamitabba.m naanubandhitabbo.

[03] ``tattha ya.m ja~n~naa puggala.m -- `ima.m kho me puggala.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti; ye ca kho me pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa te ^a^T4.0380^ea^ ca appakasirena samudaagacchanti; yassa camhi atthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito so ca me saama~n~nattho na bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchatii'ti, tenaavuso, puggalena so puggalo sa"nkhaapi anaapucchaa pakkamitabba.m naanubandhitabbo.

[03] ``tattha ya.m ja~n~naa puggala.m -- `ima.m kho me puggala.m sevato akusalaa ^a^P4.0367^ea^ dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti; ye ca kho me pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa te ca kasirena samudaagacchanti; yassa camhi atthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito so ca me saama~n~nattho bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchatii'ti, tenaavuso, puggalena so puggalo sa"nkhaapi anubandhitabbo na pakkamitabba.m.

[03] ``tattha ^a^M3.0176^ea^ ya.m ja~n~naa puggala.m -- `ima.m kho me puggala.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti; ye ca kho me pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa te ca appakasirena samudaagacchanti; yassa camhi atthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito so ca me saama~n~nattho bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchatii'ti, tenaavuso, puggalena so puggalo yaavajiiva.m anubandhitabbo na pakkamitabba.m api panujjamaanena {pa.nujjamaanena (?)}. `puggalopi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```ciivarampi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabba.m -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ^a^T4.0381^ea^ kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa ciivara.m -- `ida.m kho me ciivara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupa.m ciivara.m na sevitabba.m ^a^V3.0185^ea^. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa ciivara.m -- `ida.m kho me ciivara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupa.m ciivara.m sevitabba.m. `ciivarampi ^a^P4.0368^ea^, aavuso, duvidhena veditabba.m -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```pi.n.dapaatopi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa pi.n.dapaata.m -- `ima.m kho me pi.n.dapaata.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupo pi.n.dapaato na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa pi.n.dapaata.m -- `ima.m kho me pi.n.dapaata.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo pi.n.dapaato sevitabbo. `pi.n.dapaatopi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```senaasanampi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabba.m -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa senaasana.m -- ``ida.m kho me senaasana.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupa.m senaasana.m na ^a^T4.0382^ea^ sevitabba.m. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa senaasana.m -- `ida.m kho me senaasana.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti ^a^M3.0177^ea^, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupa.m senaasana.m sevitabba.m. `senaasanampi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabba.m -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```gaamanigamopi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa gaamanigama.m -- `ima.m kho me gaamanigama.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupo gaamanigamo na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa gaamanigama.m -- `ima.m kho, me gaamanigama.m ^a^P4.0369^ea^ sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo gaamanigamo sevitabbo. `gaamanigamopi, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```janapadapadesopi ^a^V3.0186^ea^, aavuso, duvidhena veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa janapadapadesa.m -- `ima.m kho me janapadapadesa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupo janapadapadeso na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa janapadapadesa.m -- `ima.m kho me janapadapadesa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo janapadapadeso sevitabbo. `janapadapadesopi, aavuso, duvidhena ^a^T4.0383^ea^ veditabbo -- sevitabbopi asevitabbopii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho sutavaa paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho sutavaa paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ekamidaaha.m, bhante, samaya.m bhagavaa idheva raajagahe viharaami giribbaje. tatra me, bhante, bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yo so, sutavaa ^a^M3.0178^ea^ {sutava (syaa0)}, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro ^a^P4.0370^ea^ anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto, abhabbo so pa~nca .thaanaani ajjhaacaritu.m -- abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropetu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaatu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sampajaanamusaa {sampajaana.m musaa (ka0 sii0)} bhaasitu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sannidhikaaraka.m kaame paribhu~njitu.m seyyathaapi pubbe agaariyabhuuto'ti. kacci meta.m, bhante, bhagavato sussuta.m suggahita.m sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita''nti?

[03] ``taggha te eta.m, sutavaa, sussuta.m suggahita.m sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m. pubbe caaha.m, sutavaa, etarahi ca eva.m vadaami -- `yo so bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto, abhabbo ^a^V3.0187^ea^ so nava .thaanaani ajjhaacaritu.m ^a^T4.0384^ea^ -- abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropetu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaatu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sampajaanamusaa bhaasitu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sannidhikaaraka.m kaame paribhu~njitu.m seyyathaapi pubbe agaariyabhuuto, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu chandaagati.m gantu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu dosaagati.m gantu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu mohaagati.m gantu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu bhayaagati.m ^a^P4.0371^ea^ gantu.m'. pubbe caaha.m, sutavaa, etarahi ca eva.m vadaami -- `yo so bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto, abhabbo so imaani nava .thaanaani ajjhaacaritu'''nti. sattama.m.

[03] ``taggha ^a^P4.0372^ea^ te eta.m, sajjha, sussuta.m suggahita.m sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m. pubbe caaha.m, sajjha ^a^V3.0188^ea^, etarahi ca eva.m vadaami -- `yo so bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto, abhabbo so nava .thaanaani ajjhaacaritu.m -- abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropetu.m...pe0... abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sannidhikaaraka.m kaame paribhu~njitu.m seyyathaapi pubbe agaariyabhuuto, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu buddha.m paccakkhaatu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu dhamma.m paccakkhaatu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sa"ngha.m paccakkhaatu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sikkha.m paccakkhaatu.m'. pubbe caaha.m, sajjha, etarahi ca eva.m vadaami -- `yo so bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto, abhabbo so imaani nava .thaanaani ajjhaacaritu'''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``navayime, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame ^a^T4.0386^ea^ nava? arahaa, arahattaaya pa.tipanno, anaagaamii, anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno, sakadaagaamii, sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno ^a^M3.0180^ea^, sotaapanno, sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno, puthujjano -- ime kho, bhikkhave, nava puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. navama.m.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0190^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``vuttho ^a^T4.0387^ea^ me, bhante, saavatthiya.m vassaavaaso. icchaamaha.m, bhante, janapadacaarika.m pakkamitu''nti. ``yassadaani tva.m, saariputta, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha ^a^P4.0374^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu acirapakkante aayasmante saariputte bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa ma.m, bhante, saariputto aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkanto''ti. atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi ^a^M3.0181^ea^ tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena saariputta.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso saariputta, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso saariputta, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa saariputto tassa bhikkhuno paccassosi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano {mahaamoggalaano (ka0)} aayasmaa ca aanando avaapura.na.m {apaapura.na.m (syaa0 ka0)} aadaaya vihaare aahi.n.danti {vihaarena vihaara.m anvaahi.n.danti (sii0 pii0), vihaara.m aahi.n.danti (syaa0)} -- ``abhikkamathaayasmanto, abhikkamathaayasmanto! idaanaayasmaa saariputto bhagavato sammukhaa siihanaada.m nadissatii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``idha te, saariputta, a~n~nataro sabrahmacaarii khiiyanadhamma.m aapanno -- `aayasmaa ma.m, bhante, saariputto aasajja ^a^T4.0388^ea^ appa.tinissajjacaarika.m pakkanto'''ti.
[03] ``yassa ^a^V3.0191^ea^ nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, pathaviya.m sucimpi nikkhipanti asucimpi nikkhipanti guuthagatampi nikkhipanti muttagatampi nikkhipanti khe.lagatampi nikkhipanti pubbagatampi nikkhipanti lohitagatampi nikkhipanti, na ca tena pathavii a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva.m ^a^P4.0375^ea^ kho aha.m, bhante, pathaviisamena cetasaa viharaami vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, aapasmi.m sucimpi dhovanti asucimpi dhovanti guuthagatampi... muttagatampi... khe.lagatampi... pubbagatampi... lohitagatampi dhovanti, na ca tena aapo a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, aaposamena cetasaa viharaami vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena ^a^M3.0182^ea^ averena abyaapajjena. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, tejo sucimpi .dahati asucimpi .dahati guuthagatampi... muttagatampi... khe.lagatampi... pubbagatampi... lohitagatampi .dahati, na ca tena tejo a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva.m kho aha.m ^a^T4.0389^ea^, bhante, tejosamena cetasaa viharaami vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, vaayo sucimpi upavaayati asucimpi upavaayati guuthagatampi... muttagatampi... khe.lagatampi... pubbagatampi... lohitagatampi upavaayati, na ca tena vaayo a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, vaayosamena cetasaa viharaami vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati ^a^V3.0192^ea^ anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P4.0376^ea^, bhante, rajohara.na.m sucimpi pu~nchati asucimpi pu~nchati guuthagatampi... muttagatampi... khe.lagatampi... pubbagatampi... lohitagatampi pu~nchati, na ca tena rajohara.na.m a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, rajohara.nasamena cetasaa viharaami vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, ca.n.daalakumaarako vaa ca.n.daalakumaarikaa vaa ka.lopihattho nantakavaasii gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pavisanto niicacitta.myeva upa.t.thapetvaa ^a^T4.0390^ea^ pavisati; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, ca.n.daalakumaarakaca.n.daalakumaarikaasamena cetasaa viharaami vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati ^a^M3.0183^ea^ anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, usabho chinnavisaa.no suurato sudanto suviniito rathiyaaya rathiya.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m anvaahi.n.danto na ki~nci hi.msati paadena vaa visaa.nena vaa; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, usabhachinnavisaa.nasamena cetasaa viharaami vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko siisa.mnhaato ahiku.napena vaa kukkuraku.napena ^a^P4.0377^ea^ vaa manussaku.napena vaa ka.n.the aasattena a.t.tiiyeyya haraayeyya jiguccheyya; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, iminaa puutikaayena a.t.tiiyaami haraayaami jigucchaami. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0193^ea^, bhante, puriso medakathaalika.m parihareyya chiddaavachidda.m uggharanta.m paggharanta.m; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, ima.m kaaya.m pariharaami chiddaavachidda.m ^a^T4.0391^ea^ uggharanta.m paggharanta.m. yassa nuuna, bhante, kaaye kaayagataasati anupa.t.thitaa assa, so idha a~n~natara.m sabrahmacaari.m aasajja appa.tinissajja caarika.m pakkameyyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yo aha.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhi.m. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha ta.m {tva.m (sii0 pii0)}, bhikkhu, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yo tva.m saariputta.m asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhi. yato ca kho tva.m, bhikkhu, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m ^a^M3.0184^ea^ pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vu.d.dhihesaa, bhikkhu, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ``navayimaa, bhikkhave {nava bhikkhave (?)}, anupubbavihaarasamaapattiyo desessaami, ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katamaa ca, bhikkhave, nava anupubbavihaarasamaapattiyo? yattha kaamaa nirujjhanti, ye ca kaame nirodhetvaa nirodhetvaa viharanti, `addhaa te aayasmanto nicchaataa nibbutaa ti.n.naa ^a^P4.0411^ea^ paara"ngataa tada"ngenaa'ti vadaami. `kattha kaamaa nirujjhanti, ke ca kaame nirodhetvaa nirodhetvaa viharanti -- ahameta.m na jaanaami ahameta.m na passaamii'ti, iti yo eva.m vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `idhaavuso ^a^T4.0425^ea^, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^M3.0210^ea^ viharati. ettha kaamaa nirujjhanti, te ca kaame nirodhetvaa nirodhetvaa viharantii'ti. addhaa, bhikkhave, asa.tho amaayaavii `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinandeyya anumodeyya; `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa namassamaano pa~njaliko payirupaaseyya.

[03] ``yattha vitakkavicaaraa nirujjhanti, ye ca vitakkavicaare nirodhetvaa nirodhetvaa viharanti, `addhaa te aayasmanto nicchaataa nibbutaa ti.n.naa paara"ngataa tada"ngenaa'ti vadaami. `kattha vitakkavicaaraa nirujjhanti, ke ca vitakkavicaare nirodhetvaa nirodhetvaa viharanti -- ahameta.m na jaanaami ahameta.m na passaamii'ti, iti yo eva.m vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniiyo ^a^V3.0220^ea^ -- `idhaavuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; ettha vitakkavicaaraa nirujjhanti, te ca vitakkavicaare nirodhetvaa nirodhetvaa viharantii'ti. addhaa, bhikkhave, asa.tho amaayaavii `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinandeyya anumodeyya; `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa namassamaano pa~njaliko payirupaaseyya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, issaaso vaa issaasantevaasii vaa ti.napurisaruupake vaa mattikaapu~nje vaa yogga.m karitvaa, so aparena samayena duurepaatii ca hoti akkha.navedhii ca mahato ca kaayassa padaaletaa; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m, te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato samanupassati. so tehi dhammehi ^a^T4.0444^ea^ citta.m pa.tivaapeti. so tehi dhammehi citta.m pa.tivaapetvaa amataaya dhaatuyaa citta.m upasa.mharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana'nti. so tattha .thito aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati. no ce aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati, teneva dhammaraagena taaya dhammanandiyaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. `aaki~nca~n~naayatanampaaha.m, nissaaya aasavaana.m khaya.m vadaamii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, yaavataa sa~n~naasamaapatti taavataa a~n~naapa.tivedho. yaani ca kho imaani, bhikkhave, nissaaya dve aayatanaani -- nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapatti ca sa~n~naavedayitanirodho ^a^V3.0234^ea^ ca, jhaayiihete ^a^M3.0224^ea^, bhikkhave, samaapattikusalehi samaapattivu.t.thaanakusalehi samaapajjitvaa vu.t.thahitvaa sammaa akkhaatabbaaniiti vadaamii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. tatra kho aayasmaa aanando bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato aanandassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa aanando etadavoca --

[03] ``acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso! yaava~ncida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sambaadhe okaasaadhigamo ^a^T4.0445^ea^ anubuddho sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya. tadeva naama cakkhu.m bhavissati te ruupaa ta~ncaayatana.m ^a^P4.0427^ea^ no pa.tisa.mvedissati {pa.tisa.mvedayati (ka0)}. tadeva naama sota.m bhavissati te saddaa ta~ncaayatana.m no pa.tisa.mvedissati. tadeva naama ghaana.m bhavissati te gandhaa ta~ncaayatana.m no pa.tisa.mvedissati. saava naama jivhaa bhavissati te rasaa ta~ncaayatana.m no pa.tisa.mvedissati. sova naama kaayo bhavissati te pho.t.thabbaa ta~ncaayatana.m no pa.tisa.mvedissatii''ti.

[03] ``ki.msa~n~nii panaavuso, tadaayatana.m no pa.tisa.mvedetii''ti? ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu, sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. eva.msa~n~niipi kho, aavuso, tadaayatana.m no pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0225^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti ^a^V3.0235^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. eva.msa~n~niipi kho, aavuso, tadaayatana.m no pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``ekamidaaha.m, aavuso, samaya.m saakete viharaami a~njanavane migadaaye. atha kho, aavuso, ja.tilavaasikaa {ja.tilagaahiyaa (sii0 pii0), ja.dilabhaagikaa (syaa0)} bhikkhunii ^a^P4.0428^ea^ yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, aavuso, ja.tilavaasikaa bhikkhunii ma.m etadavoca -- `yaaya.m, bhante aananda, samaadhi na caabhinato na caapanato na ca sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritagato {sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritavato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaarivaava.to (ka0) a0 ni0 3.102; 5.27; dii0 ni0 3.355}, vimuttattaa .thito, .thitattaa santusito, santusitattaa no paritassati. aya.m, bhante aananda, samaadhi ki.mphalo vutto bhagavataa'''ti?

[03] ``eva.m vutte, soha.m, aavuso, ja.tilavaasika.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca.m -- `yaaya.m, bhagini, samaadhi na caabhinato na caapanato na ca sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritagato, vimuttattaa .thito, .thitattaa santusito, santusitattaa no paritassati. aya.m, bhagini, samaadhi a~n~naaphalo vutto bhagavataa'ti. eva.msa~n~niipi kho, aavuso, tadaayatana.m no pa.tisa.mvedetii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ atha kho dve lokaayatikaa braahma.naa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te braahma.naa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``puura.no, bho gotama, kassapo sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati -- `carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ^a^M3.0226^ea^ ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m ^a^T4.0447^ea^ paccupa.t.thita'nti. so evamaaha -- `aha.m anantena ~naa.nena ananta.m loka.m jaana.m passa.m ^a^V3.0236^ea^ viharaamii'ti. ayampi ^a^P4.0429^ea^ {ayampi hi (syaa0 ka0)}, bho gotama, niga.n.tho naa.taputto sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati -- `carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita'nti. so {sopi (?)} evamaaha -- `aha.m anantena ~naa.nena ananta.m loka.m jaana.m passa.m viharaamii'ti. imesa.m, bho gotama, ubhinna.m ~naa.navaadaana.m ubhinna.m a~n~nama~n~na.m vipaccaniikavaadaana.m ko sacca.m aaha ko musaa''ti?

[03] ``ala.m, braahma.naa! ti.t.thateta.m -- `imesa.m ubhinna.m ~naa.navaadaana.m ubhinna.m a~n~nama~n~na.m vipaccaniikavaadaana.m ko sacca.m aaha ko musaa'ti. dhamma.m vo, braahma.naa, desessaami, ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho te braahma.naa bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.naa, cattaaro purisaa catuddisaa .thitaa paramena javena ca samannaagataa paramena ca padaviitihaarena. te evaruupena javena samannaagataa assu, seyyathaapi naama da.lhadhammaa {da.lhadhammo (sabbattha) a0 ni0 4.45; ma0 ni0 1.116 ca, ta.msa.mva.n.nanaa.tiikaayo ca moggallaanabyaakara.na~nca oloketabbaa} dhanuggaho sikkhito katahattho katuupaasano lahukena asanena appakasirena tiriya.m taalacchaaya.m {taalacchaati.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0), taalacchaadi.m (ka0) a0 ni0 4.45; ma0 ni0 1.161 passitabba.m} atipaateyya; evaruupena ca padaviitihaarena, seyyathaapi naama puratthimaa samuddaa pacchimo samuddo atha puratthimaaya disaaya .thito puriso eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m gamanena lokassa anta.m paapu.nissaamii'ti. so a~n~natreva asitapiitakhaayitasaayitaa a~n~natra uccaarapassaavakammaa a~n~natra niddaakilamathapa.tivinodanaa ^a^T4.0448^ea^ vassasataayuko vassasatajiivii vassasata.m gantvaa appatvaava lokassa anta.m antaraa kaala.m ^a^P4.0430^ea^ kareyya. atha pacchimaaya disaaya...pe0... atha uttaraaya disaaya... atha dakkhi.naaya disaaya .thito puriso eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m gamanena lokassa anta.m paapu.nissaamii'ti. so a~n~natreva asitapiitakhaayitasaayitaa a~n~natra uccaarapassaavakammaa a~n~natra ^a^M3.0227^ea^ niddaakilamathapa.tivinodanaa vassasataayuko vassasatajiivii vassasata.m gantvaa appatvaava lokassa anta.m antaraa kaala.m kareyya. ta.m kissa hetu? naaha.m, braahma.naa, evaruupaaya sandhaavanikaaya lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m patteyyanti vadaami. na caaha.m, braahma.naa, appatvaava lokassa anta.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaami.

[03] ``pa~ncime, braahma.naa, kaamagu.naa ariyassa vinaye lokoti vuccati. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ^a^V3.0237^ea^ ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa; sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa; ime kho, braahma.naa, pa~nca kaamagu.naa ariyassa vinaye lokoti vuccati.

[03] ``idha, braahma.naa, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, braahma.naa, `bhikkhu lokassa antamaagamma, lokassa ante viharati'. tama~n~ne evamaaha.msu -- `ayampi ^a^T4.0449^ea^ lokapariyaapanno, ayampi anissa.to lokamhaa'ti. ahampi hi {ahampi (sii0 pii0)}, braahma.naa, eva.m vadaami -- `ayampi lokapariyaapanno, ayampi anissa.to lokamhaa'''ti.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho {samupabbuu.lho (sii0 pii0)} ahosi. tasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sa"ngaame asuraa jini.msu, devaa paraajayi.msu {paraajiyi.msu (sii0 syaa0 ka0)}. paraajitaa ca, bhikkhave, devaa {devaa bhiitaa (pii0)} apayi.msuyeva {apaya.msveva (sii0)} uttarenaabhimukhaa, abhiyi.msu {abhiya.msu (sii0)} asuraa. atha kho, bhikkhave, devaana.m etadahosi -- `abhiyanteva kho asuraa. ya.mnuuna maya.m dutiyampi asurehi sa"ngaameyyaamaa'ti. dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devaa asurehi sa"ngaamesu.m. dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asuraava jini.msu, devaa paraajayi.msu. paraajitaa ca, bhikkhave, devaa apayi.msuyeva uttarenaabhimukhaa, abhiyi.msu asuraa''.
