[03] ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^V3.0239^ea^, bhikkhave, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho ahosi. tasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sa"ngaame devaa jini.msu, asuraa paraajayi.msu. paraajitaa ca, bhikkhave, asuraa apayi.msuyeva dakkhi.nenaabhimukhaa, abhiyi.msu devaa. atha kho, bhikkhave, asuraana.m etadahosi -- `abhiyanteva kho devaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m dutiyampi devehi sa"ngaameyyaamaa'ti. dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asuraa devehi sa"ngaamesu.m. dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devaa jini.msu, asuraa paraajayi.msu. paraajitaa ca, bhikkhave, asuraa apayi.msuyeva dakkhi.nenaabhimukhaa, abhiyi.msu devaa''.

[03] atha kho, bhikkhave, asuraana.m etadahosi -- `abhiyanteva kho devaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m tatiyampi devehi sa"ngaameyyaamaa'ti. tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asuraa devehi sa"ngaamesu.m. tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devaa jini.msu, asuraa paraajayi.msu. paraajitaa ca, bhikkhave, asuraa bhiitaa asurapura.myeva pavisi.msu. asurapuragataana~nca pana, bhikkhave, asuraana.m etadahosi -- `bhiiruttaanagatena kho daani maya.m etarahi attanaa viharaama akara.niiyaa ^a^T4.0452^ea^ devehii'ti. devaanampi, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `bhiiruttaanagatena kho daani asuraa etarahi attanaa viharanti akara.niiyaa amhehii'ti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa eva.m hoti -- `bhiiruttaanagatena kho daanaaha.m etarahi attanaa viharaami ^a^P4.0434^ea^ akara.niiyo maarassaa'ti ^a^M3.0230^ea^. maarassaapi, bhikkhave, paapimato eva.m hoti -- `bhiiruttaanagatena kho daani bhikkhu etarahi attanaa viharati akara.niiyo mayha'''nti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ^a^V3.0240^ea^ bhikkhussa eva.m hoti -- `bhiiruttaanagatena kho daanaaha.m etarahi attanaa viharaami akara.niiyo maarassaa'ti. maarassaapi, bhikkhave, paapimato eva.m hoti -- `bhiiruttaanagatena kho daani bhikkhu etarahi attanaa viharati, akara.niiyo mayha'''nti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu antamakaasi maara.m, apada.m vadhitvaa maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato ti.n.no loke visattika'''nti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati... sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ^a^T4.0453^ea^ ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati... sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati... sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu antamakaasi maara.m, apada.m vadhitvaa maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato ti.n.no loke visattika'''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ``yasmi.m ^a^P4.0435^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye aara~n~nikassa naagassa gocarapasutassa hatthiipi hatthiniyopi hatthikalabhaapi hatthicchaapaapi purato purato gantvaa ti.naggaani chindanti, tena, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko naago a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye aara~n~nikassa naagassa gocarapasutassa hatthiipi hatthiniyopi hatthikalabhaapi hatthicchaapaapi obhaggobhagga.m saakhaabha"nga.m khaadanti, tena, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko naago a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati. yasmi.m ^a^M3.0231^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye aara~n~nikassa naagassa ogaaha.m oti.n.nassa hatthiipi hatthiniyopi hatthikalabhaapi hatthicchaapaapi purato purato gantvaa so.n.daaya udaka.m aalo.lenti, tena, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko naago a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye aara~n~nikassa ^a^V3.0241^ea^ naagassa ogaahaa utti.n.nassa hatthiniyo kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo gacchanti, tena, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko naago a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati.

[03] ``tasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye aara~n~nikassa naagassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho etarahi aaki.n.no viharaami hatthiihi hatthiniihi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchaapehi ^a^T4.0454^ea^. chinnaggaani ceva ti.naani khaadaami, obhaggobhagga~nca me saakhaabha"nga.m khaadanti {khaadita.m (syaa0 ka0) mahaava0 467 passitabba.m}, aavilaani ca paaniiyaani pivaami, ogaahaa ca {ogaahaapi ca (syaa0 ka0) mahaava0 467 passitabba.m} me utti.n.nassa hatthiniyo kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo gacchanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m eko ga.nasmaa vuupaka.t.tho vihareyya'nti. so aparena samayena eko ga.nasmaa vuupaka.t.tho viharati, acchinnaggaani ceva ti.naani khaadati, obhaggobhagga~ncassa saakhaabha"nga.m ^a^P4.0436^ea^ na khaadanti {na obhaggobhagga~nca saakhaabha"nga khaadati (syaa0 ka0)}, anaavilaani ca paaniiyaani pivati, ogaahaa cassa utti.n.nassa na hatthiniyo kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo gacchanti.

[03] ``tasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye aara~n~nikassa naagassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho pubbe aaki.n.no vihaasi.m hatthiihi hatthiniihi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchaapehi, chinnaggaani ceva ti.naani khaadi.m, obhaggobhagga~nca me saakhaabha"nga.m khaadi.msu, aavilaani ca paaniiyaani apaayi.m, ogaahaa {ettha pisaddo sabbatthapi natthi} ca me utti.n.nassa hatthiniyo kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo agama.msu. soha.m etarahi eko ga.nasmaa vuupaka.t.tho viharaami, acchinnaggaani ceva ti.naani khaadaami, obhaggobhagga~nca me saakhaabha"nga.m na khaadanti, anaavilaani ca paaniiyaani pivaami, ogaahaa ca me utti.n.nassa na hatthiniyo kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo gacchantii'ti. so so.n.daaya saakhaabha"nga.m bha~njitvaa saakhaabha"ngena kaaya.m parimajjitvaa attamano so.n.da.m sa.mharati {ka.n.du.m sa.mhanti (sii0 pii0) ka.n.du.m sa.mhanati (syaa0), ettha ka.n.duvanadukkha.m vinetiiti attho},.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu aaki.n.no viharati bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi ra~n~naa raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi ^a^M3.0232^ea^ titthiyasaavakehi, tasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho etarahi aaki.n.no viharaami bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi ^a^T4.0455^ea^ upaasikaahi ra~n~naa raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi. ya.mnuunaaha.m eko ga.nasmaa vuupaka.t.tho vihareyya'nti. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m ^a^P4.0437^ea^ pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m ^a^V3.0242^ea^. so ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa.

[03] ``so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti; byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti; thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti; uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti. so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so attamano so.n.da.m sa.mharati {ka.n.du.m sa.mhanti (sii0 pii0), ka.n.du.m sa.mhanati (syaa0), ettha ka.n.duvanasadisa.m jhaanapa.tipakkha.m kilesadukkha.m vinetiiti attho}. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so attamano so.n.da.m sa.mharati.

[03] ``sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so attamano so.n.da.m ^a^T4.0456^ea^ sa.mharati. sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati... sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati... sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati... sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m ^a^M3.0233^ea^ ^a^P4.0438^ea^ samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. so attamano so.n.da.m sa.mharatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0243^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa mallesu viharati uruvelakappa.m naama mallaana.m nigamo. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya uruvelakappa.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. uruvelakappe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``idheva taava tva.m, aananda, hohi, yaavaaha.m mahaavana.m ajjhogaahaami divaavihaaraayaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.

[03] atha kho tapusso gahapati yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho tapusso gahapati aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca --

[03] ``maya.m, bhante aananda, gihii kaamabhogino kaamaaraamaa kaamarataa kaamasammuditaa. tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m gihiina.m kaamabhogiina.m kaamaaraamaana.m kaamarataana.m kaamasammuditaana.m ^a^T4.0457^ea^ papaato viya khaayati, yadida.m nekkhamma.m. suta.m meta.m, bhante, `imasmi.m dhammavinaye daharaana.m daharaana.m bhikkhuuna.m nekkhamme citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato' {passata.m (?)}. tayida.m, bhante, imasmi.m dhammavinaye bhikkhuuna.m bahunaa janena visabhaago, yadida.m nekkhamma''nti.

[03] ``atthi ^a^P4.0439^ea^ kho eta.m, gahapati, kathaapaabhata.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. aayaama, gahapati, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocessaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho tapusso gahapati aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa aanando tapussena gahapatinaa saddhi.m ^a^M3.0234^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``aya.m ^a^V3.0244^ea^, bhante, tapusso gahapati evamaaha -- `maya.m, bhante aananda, gihii kaamabhogino kaamaaraamaa kaamarataa kaamasammuditaa, tesa.m no bhante, amhaaka.m gihiina.m kaamabhogiina.m kaamaaraamaana.m kaamarataana.m kaamasammuditaana.m papaato viya khaayati, yadida.m nekkhamma.m'. suta.m meta.m, bhante, `imasmi.m dhammavinaye daharaana.m daharaana.m bhikkhuuna.m nekkhamme citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tayida.m, bhante, imasmi.m dhammavinaye bhikkhuuna.m bahunaa janena visabhaago yadida.m nekkhamma'''nti.

[03] ``evameta.m, aananda, evameta.m, aananda! mayhampi kho, aananda, pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `saadhu nekkhamma.m ^a^T4.0458^ea^, saadhu paviveko'ti. tassa mayha.m, aananda, nekkhamme citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo, yena me nekkhamme citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `kaamesu kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca me abahuliikato, nekkhamme ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ca me anaasevito ^a^P4.0440^ea^. tasmaa me nekkhamme citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m kaamesu aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahula.m kareyya.m {bahuliikareyya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me nekkhamme citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena kaamesu aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, nekkhamme citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. so kho aha.m, aananda, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aananda, iminaa vihaarena viharato kaamasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho ^a^M3.0235^ea^. seyyathaapi, aananda, sukhino dukkha.m uppajjeyya ^a^T4.0459^ea^ yaavadeva aabaadhaaya; evamevassa me kaamasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m ^a^V3.0245^ea^ jhaana.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, aananda, avitakke citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo, yena me avitakke citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `vitakkesu kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca me abahuliikato, avitakke ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ca ^a^P4.0441^ea^ me anaasevito. tasmaa me avitakke citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m vitakkesu aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahula.m kareyya.m, avitakke aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me avitakke citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena vitakkesu aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m, avitakke aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, avitakke citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. so kho aha.m, aananda, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^T4.0460^ea^ viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aananda, iminaa vihaarena viharato vitakkasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho. seyyathaapi, aananda, sukhino dukkha.m uppajjeyya yaavadeva aabaadhaaya; evamevassa me vitakkasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca vihareyya.m sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeyya.m ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaariiti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, aananda, nippiitike citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo ^a^M3.0236^ea^, yena me nippiitike citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `piitiyaa kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca me abahuliikato, nippiitike ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ca me anaasevito. tasmaa me nippiitike citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati ^a^P4.0442^ea^ na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m piitiyaa aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m ^a^V3.0246^ea^ bahula.m kareyya.m, nippiitike aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me nippiitike citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena piitiyaa aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m, nippiitike aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, nippiitike citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. so ^a^T4.0461^ea^ kho aha.m, aananda, piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aananda, iminaa vihaarena viharato piitisahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho. seyyathaapi, aananda, sukhino dukkha.m uppajjeyya yaavadeva aabaadhaaya; evamevassa me piitisahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, aananda, adukkhamasukhe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo, yena me adukkhamasukhe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `upekkhaasukhe kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca me abahuliikato, adukkhamasukhe ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ca me anaasevito. tasmaa me adukkhamasukhe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m ^a^T4.0462^ea^ santanti passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m upekkhaasukhe aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m ^a^P4.0443^ea^ bahula.m kareyya.m, adukkhamasukhe aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m ^a^M3.0237^ea^ kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me adukkhamasukhe citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena upekkhaasukhe aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m adukkhamasukhe aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, adukkhamasukhe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. so kho aha.m, aananda, sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... ^a^V3.0247^ea^ catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aananda, iminaa vihaarena viharato upekkhaasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho. seyyathaapi, aananda, sukhino dukkha.m uppajjeyya yaavadeva aabaadhaaya; evamevassa me upekkhaasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa ``ananto aakaaso''ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, aananda, aakaasaana~ncaayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo, yena ^a^T4.0463^ea^ me aakaasaana~ncaayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ruupesu kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca abahuliikato, aakaasaana~ncaayatane ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ca me anaasevito. tasmaa me aakaasaana~ncaayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti ^a^P4.0444^ea^ passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m ruupesu aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahula.m kareyya.m, aakaasaana~ncaayatane aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me aakaasaana~ncaayatane citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena ruupesu aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m, aakaasaana~ncaayatane aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, aakaasaana~ncaayatane citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. so kho aha.m, aananda, sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa ^a^M3.0238^ea^ pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aananda, iminaa vihaarena viharato ruupasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho. seyyathaapi, aananda, sukhino dukkha.m uppajjeyya yaavadeva aabaadhaaya; evamevassa me ruupasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho.

[03] ``tassa ^a^T4.0464^ea^ mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma ^a^V3.0248^ea^ ``ananta.m vi~n~naa.na''nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, aananda, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo, yena me vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `aakaasaana~ncaayatane kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca abahuliikato, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ca me anaasevito. tasmaa me vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m aakaasaana~ncaayatane aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahula.m ^a^P4.0445^ea^ kareyya.m, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena aakaasaana~ncaayatane aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. so kho aha.m, aananda, sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m ^a^T4.0465^ea^ upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aananda, iminaa vihaarena viharato aakaasaana~ncaayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho. seyyathaapi, aananda, sukhino dukkha.m uppajjeyya yaavadeva aabaadhaaya ^a^M3.0239^ea^; evamevassa me aakaasaana~ncaayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma natthi ki~nciiti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, aananda, aaki~nca~n~naayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo, yena me aaki~nca~n~naayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca me abahuliikato, aaki~nca~n~naayatane ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ca me anaasevito. tasmaa me aaki~nca~n~naayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati ^a^V3.0249^ea^ na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahula.m kareyya.m, aaki~nca~n~naayatane aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m kho ^a^T4.0466^ea^ paneta.m vijjati ya.m me aaki~nca~n~naayatane ^a^P4.0446^ea^ citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m, aaki~nca~n~naayatane aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, aaki~nca~n~naayatane citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. so kho aha.m, aananda, sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aananda, iminaa vihaarena viharato vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho. seyyathaapi, aananda, sukhino dukkha.m uppajjeyya yaavadeva aabaadhaaya; evamevassa me vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, aananda, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi ^a^M3.0240^ea^ -- `ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo, yena me nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `aaki~nca~n~naayatane kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca me abahuliikato, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane ^a^T4.0467^ea^ ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ca me anaasevito. tasmaa me nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m aaki~nca~n~naayatane aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahula.m kareyya.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so ^a^P4.0447^ea^ kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena aaki~nca~n~naayatane aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti ^a^V3.0250^ea^ passato. so kho aha.m, aananda, sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aananda, iminaa vihaarena viharato aaki~nca~n~naayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho. seyyathaapi, aananda, sukhino dukkha.m uppajjeyya yaavadeva aabaadhaaya; evamevassa me aaki~nca~n~naayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti. svassa me hoti aabaadho.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti. tassa ^a^T4.0468^ea^ mayha.m, aananda, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo, yena me sa~n~naavedayitanirodhe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'? tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane kho me aadiinavo adi.t.tho, so ca me abahuliikato, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhe ca aanisa.mso anadhigato, so ^a^M3.0241^ea^ ca me anaasevito. tasmaa me sa~n~naavedayitanirodhe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati eta.m santanti passato'. tassa mayha.m, aananda, etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahula.m kareyya.m, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhe aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaaseveyya.m, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me sa~n~naavedayitanirodhe citta.m pakkhandeyya pasiideyya santi.t.theyya vimucceyya eta.m santanti passato'. so kho aha.m, aananda, aparena samayena nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane aadiinava.m disvaa ta.m bahulamakaasi.m ^a^P4.0448^ea^, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhe aanisa.msa.m adhigamma tamaasevi.m. tassa mayha.m, aananda, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati eta.m santanti passato. so kho aha.m, aananda, sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharaami, pa~n~naaya ca me disvaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m agama.msu.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m ^a^T4.0469^ea^, aananda, imaa nava anupubbavihaarasamaapattiyo na eva.m anulomapa.tiloma.m samaapajjimpi vu.t.thahimpi, neva taavaaha.m, aananda, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca kho aha.m, aananda, imaa nava anupubbavihaarasamaapattiyo eva.m anulomapa.tiloma.m ^a^V3.0251^ea^ samaapajjimpi vu.t.thahimpi, athaaha.m, aananda, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me cetovimutti {vimutti (ka0 sii0 ka0)}, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. dasama.m.

[01] ``katamo, aavuso, sambaadho, katamo sambaadhe okaasaadhigamo vutto bhagavataa''ti? ``pa~ncime, aavuso, kaamagu.naa sambaadho vutto bhagavataa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime kho, aavuso, pa~nca kaamagu.naa sambaadho vutto bhagavataa.
